title: Sade - The Ultimate Collection [2011] only1joe 320kbsMP3
description:
Sade - The Ultimate Collection [2011] only1joe 320kbsMP3

The Ultimate Collection is the second compilation album (and tenth overall album) by English soul band Sade, released on 3 May 2011 by RCA Records. The album includes many singles from the band's long career including the hit singles "Your Love Is King", "Smooth Operator", "By Your Side", "No Ordinary Love" and "Soldier of Love". The album also includes four new tracks, a cover of Thin Lizzy's 1974 song "Still in Love with You", a remix of "The Moon and the Sky" featuring Jay-Z, songs from Soldier of Love and two previously unreleased tracks titled "I Would Have Never Guessed" and "Love Is Found". The band promoted the album with their first concert tour in ten years, Sade Live.
